security: Revealing that David Christ held special clearances (SI & TK) and requesting his TOP SECRET clearance be activated could expose sensitive information and methods related to Agency-sponsored work and personnel security protocols.
summary: A memo from Richard P. O'Brien, Security Officer, requesting the activation of David Lamar Christ's TOP SECRET clearance for his work with Devenco, a company with a contractual relationship with the Agency, as Christ requires SI & TK clearances for his current role.
summary_one_paragraph: This memorandum, dated December 10, 1970, from Richard P. O'Brien, a Security Officer in ORD/DD/S&T, is addressed to C/PSD/OS, specifically Mr. Joseph Hossick, concerning David Lamar Christ, a former Chief of the Applied Physics Division who retired from the Agency in November 1970 and is now employed by Devenco of New York City; the memo requests that Christ's TOP SECRET clearance be activated, along with his SI & TK special clearances, to facilitate his involvement in Agency-sponsored work conducted through Devenco.
title: CHRIST, David Lamar #43872
